GSD.product_version: versions from v6.1 to before v6.1.9
GSD.description:
Bluetooth: hci_sync: fix memory leak in hci_update_adv_data()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.1.9 by commit 8ac6043bd3e5b58d30f50737aedc2e58e8087ad5, it was introduced in version v6.1 by commit 651cd3d65b0f76a2198fcf3a80ce5d53dd267717. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: Bluetooth: hci_sync: fix memory leak in hci_update_adv_data()
OSV.details:
